physical_appearance:This is an embroidered kanjari blouse. It is red
 featuring multicolored embroided diamond and floral patterns across the body. In the center
 there is a black panel. The sleeves feature a brocade panel.
subject_terms_1:folk costume embroidery (visual works) flower (motif) lozenges blouses (main garments) tops (garments
 general)

subject_terms_3:Indian costumes
subject_terms_4:
sgcool_label_text:Blouse worn by the Jain community of eastern Kutch. The sleeves of the blouse are made of brocade
 while the rest is covered in fine embroidery.
